"Why Upload Two Copies Of The Same Album ?"


For fans, collectors and audiophiles alike to compare and enjoy the quality differences between the original 1980's release
and the 2003 digitally remastered version.

Whatever version you prefer "Seven And The Ragger Tiger" IMO is and always will be one of the best Duran Duran albums you will ever hear.
